result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher Lawrence Buol

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on November 14, 2022 at 09:15 am.

Adjustment Number: 22A 867121,

Amount: $20.00

3:34 PM Defendant Christopher Lawrence Buol appeared by video.  Attorney Michael Shannon Murphy appeared by video for Christopher Lawrence Buol.  Prosecuting attorney Mason C Braunschweig appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Preliminary hearing requested by zoom. Time limits waived.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 09:15 am.

Cannot operate a motor vehicle during pendency of case. Maintain absolute sobriety at all times. No contact directly or indirectly with victim S.L.S., his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere.

Activity:  Initial appearance  
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

3:27 PM  Defendant Christopher Lawrence Buol appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Taylor E Klokow appeared by video for Christopher Lawrence Buol.  Prosecuting attorney Cheniqua White appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, address and date of birth confirmed, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Cash bond of $1000 set.  Absolute sobriety.  No driving at all.  No contact directly or indirectly with victim S.L.S., his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
